choices.C: On the 'Send to' tab on the Notification record, add the Caller field, then dot walk to the Callerâ€™s Manager field to add it.
choices.A: On the 'Who will receive' tab on the Notification record add the Caller field, then dot walk to the Caller's Manager field to add it.

questions.question_text:
Your customer wants to update a notification so it is sent to the Caller's Manager.

Which action supports this requirement?
Which action enables a user to view and specify date and time formats in their instance?

choices.E: Create a UI Script to set the default timezone
choices.C: Use the system properties to correct the instance's time zone
choices.A: Select the User menu > Preferences > Time Settings > Toggle display time zone
choices.B: Ask the user to adjust the time zone on their personal computer
choices.D: Select the User menu > Preferences > Language & Region > Set date and time format and time zone

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The answer is C. 
All-> system properties -> System Configuration

Regarding D, there's no Language & Region. The only way using the preferences is to go to display and change the time there.

choices.A: The human-readable labels and language settings
choices.C: The information on how tables relate to each other
choices.D: The language dictionary used for spell checking
choices.B: The definition for each table and column

questions.question_text: What information does the System Dictionary contain?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The system dictionary is a table, called Dictionary Entry [sys_dictionary], that contains details for each table and the definition for every column on each table in an instance.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-platform-administration/page/administer/data-dictionary-tables/concept/c_SystemDictionary.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

B is correct!
Insert -> Saves the item as a new record and returns to the previously viewed page.
Update -> Click Submit or Update to save changes and return to the previously viewed page.
